title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 7.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 7.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth procedures in addition to those
contained in 6 NYCRR Part
617, which are necessary for the commission's
implementation of the State Environmental Quality Review Act. The terms used in
this Part have the meanings given them in 6 NYCRR
617.2, unless the context
otherwise requires. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
